name: Blooming Regards
description:
Taking a walk at night may have had other meanings on other days, but tonight, it has a lot of meanings - a lot of complicated ones, as you might find out in this 2D platformer.

Made around the concept of a one-button game.

Sources

  • Sound: Music
  • Fonts:  Lover's Quarrel, Amatic SC
  • Other: Letter stain
